tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE local_guides (
    guide_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    guide_name VARCHAR(50),
    guide_location VARCHAR(100),
    guide_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE cultural_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    guide_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES local_guides(guide_id)
);

CREATE TABLE guide_experience (
    guide_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY(guide_id, experience_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES local_guides(guide_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES cultural_experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE guide_reviews (
  review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  guide_id INT REFERENCES local_guides(guide_id),
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  review_rating FLOAT,
  review_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE experience_reviews (
  review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  experience_id INT REFERENCES cultural_experiences(experience_id),
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  review_rating FLOAT,
  review_comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE guide_experience (
    guide_id INT,
    experience_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (guide_id, experience_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES local_guides(guide_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES cultural_experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES cultural_experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_id INT,
    guide_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES cultural_experiences(experience_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (guide_id) REFERENCES local_guides(guide_id)
);
